name: dentix-ortho
description: A full-stack CRM dashboard for Cloud 9 Ortho (Dentrix Orthodontic) practice management system integration.

scripts.start:replit: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run serve:all
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.serve:all: cd backend && npm start & cd frontend && npm run preview -- --host 0.0.0.0
